id: FREE Wishlist Shopping Tracker Notion Template

description: As someone with ADHD, I know it can be challenging to resist the urge to buy everything in sight. So rather than completely fight the urge, why not reduce your impulse buying and become more intentional with your spendings. This wish list tracker will help you consolidate and evaluate items on your wish list in order to help refine and narrow them down to help make smart purchasing decisions.This template includes:→ Customisable categories that can be organised based on your wants→ Sort your wis
